house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1980 has 3 bedroom(s), 2.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Prudential California Realty Prudential California Realty
